message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand where you're coming from, but I'm not quite ready to let it go for $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though! I'll do $105. It's a fair compromise, if you ask me.
I'm glad we're making progress, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.

I understand where you're coming from, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll do $102. It's getting close to my minimum, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to stick with my previous offer of $95. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I've gone as low as I can, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $102. I'm willing to hold out for a better offer, but I'm also willing to consider other buyers. If you're not willing to meet me at $102, I'll have to explore other options.
